Articles.Content: Hi, for the past 8 months the community of Stratzenblitz75 has creating a community project called the Upsilon Initiative. Essentially we wanted to create a community effort to colonize the entire kerbol system, and completely streamline it with automated systems so anyone could participate in the project. You can land a few kerbals on eve and call it "colonized" but we want to do that on a HUGE scale. If you want to join us watch the video and join our discord. If you want some background history read on. About 8 months ago Stratzenblitz75 created a community project called the Sigma Initiative, which could not be completed because it was done all manually and it took in hundreds of submissions. When it failed we took initiative to create the Upsilon Initiative, a completely automated version that would require no human intervention. Anyways there's your brief history lesson, go watch the video.
